Green: indicating the child is well nourished,
Yellow: indicating the child is at risk of acute malnutrition
Red: indicating the child has severe acute malnutrition

Record the Mid Upper Arm Circumference (MUAC) indicators as per provided codes i.e. 1. Green: indicatingthe child is well nourished, 2. Yellow: indicating the childis at risk of acute malnutrition and 3. Red: indicating the child has severe acute malnutrition. Manage the child as per IMNCI and IMAM guidelines.
